recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara 🍝
recipes.instructions: Boil pasta. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all together.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani 🍗
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken. Cook rice separately. Layer and cook together.

recipes.name: Margherita Pizza 🍕
recipes.instructions: Prepare dough. Spread sauce. Add cheese & basil. Bake in oven.

recipes.name: Paneer Butter Masala 🧈
recipes.instructions: Cook tomatoes & cashews. Blend into sauce. Add paneer & cream.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake 🍫🎂
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients. Bake in oven at 180°C for 30 mins.

recipes.name: Mango Smoothie 🥭🥤
recipes.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

recipes.name: French Fries 🍟
recipes.instructions: Cut potatoes into fries. Fry until golden brown. Add salt & pepper.
